channel.title: Need some help with this if possible!
channel.description:
Hey,
I have some difficulties with my client I think, whenever I type something, it doesn't show up above the players' character. However, it does show up in the chatbox. I added a npc which would shout something, but you also cannot see that. Also, in combat, you don't see HP bars or hitsplats.
I'm working with a low revision PI, 317 if I'm correct.
Does anyone know what's wrong?

item.title: Need some help with this if possible!
item.dc:creator: @Derpington Derpington
item.description:
@Derpington wrote:

Hey,

I have some difficulties with my client I think, whenever I type something, it doesn’t show up above the players’ character. However, it does show up in the chatbox. I added a npc which would shout something, but you also cannot see that. Also, in combat, you don’t see HP bars or hitsplats.

I’m working with a low revision PI, 317 if I’m correct.

Does anyone know what’s wrong?
